{"id":1250631273,"question_id":3395,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1714978345,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"205 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1250631273/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Length of Anagram Concatenation","memory":"27.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minAnagramLength(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int index = 0; // Declare index here\n        for (int potentialSize = 1; potentialSize < n; ++potentialSize) {\n            if (n % potentialSize == 0) {\n                string initialSegment = s.substr(0, potentialSize);\n                sort(initialSegment.begin(), initialSegment.end());\n                for (index = potentialSize; index < n; index += potentialSize) {\n                    string currentSegment = s.substr(index, potentialSize);\n                    sort(currentSegment.begin(), currentSegment.end());\n                    if (initialSegment != currentSegment) {\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n                if (index == n) {\n                    return potentialSize;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return n;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-length-of-anagram-concatenation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
